name: Golden Trivia
description:
Golden Trivia is a timed trivia game about The Golden Girls TV show. Test your knowledge of show trivia with four different levels of difficulty from easy to fanatic. Additional trivia quizzes are on the actors and information surrounding the show. Make the Golden Girls Bea proud of your knowledge!

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Start menu music "The Golden Girls Theme Instrumental Version" from movieman95:  https://youtu.be/Gjz73G1Huhg
